column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////The 16 oz filet mignon bone in was great to share
column2: the elote corn was freaking amazing
column3: the Brussels sprouts could turn anyone into a sprouts fan
column4: and the duck terrine was perfect. The west coast oysters were much better than the east coast
column5: both were briny. The shrimp were huge. The crab legs were the perfect sweetness and great in the drawn butter sauce.
